project.name: Buy Me a Coffee - Cyberpunk Edition
project.description: A futuristic cyberpunk-themed donation platform with gamification, AI agents, and real-time features

tech_stack.styling: Tailwind CSS with custom cyberpunk theme

core.name: Frictionless Support Flow
core.description: One-click coffee donation with Stripe Checkout

core.name: Monthly Subscriptions
core.description: Toggle between one-time and monthly recurring support

core.name: Custom Amount Input
core.description: Users can enter any amount or choose presets ($3, $5, $10)

core.name: Stripe Webhooks
core.description: Automatic supporter data storage on successful checkout

core.name: Local-First Database
core.description: SQLite database with Prisma ORM for easy deployment

ui_components.name: Hero Section
ui_components.description: A/B tested headlines with emotional connection ('If I made you smile, buy me a coffee ‚òï')

ui_components.name: Coffee Tier Widget
ui_components.description: Interactive tier cards ($3, $5, $10) with neon glow effects

ui_components.name: Goal Progress Bar
ui_components.description: Real-time monthly goal tracking with animated progress

ui_components.name: Supporters Wall
ui_components.description: Live feed of recent supporters with names, amounts, and messages

ui_components.name: Success Page
ui_components.description: Gratitude message with share buttons and monthly CTA

ui_components.name: Dev Quote of the Day
ui_components.description: Database-backed daily quotes that change at 12:00 PM AEST

gamification.description: Neon particle explosion on support button click

gamification.name: Neon Tip Streak
gamification.description: Live indicator showing recent supporter activity

features: Follows mouse cursor with smooth spring physics
Tells 3 AI jokes on click, then prompts support
Auto-scrolls to support section when 'out of energy'

interactive_elements.name: Coffee Agent
interactive_elements.description: Coffee-themed draggable agent with same features as AI agent

interactive_elements.name: Crypto-Matrix Easter Egg
interactive_elements.description: Hidden Matrix rain effect triggered by pressing 'M' three times or Konami code

api_routes.description: Creates Stripe checkout session for one-time or monthly donations
Stripe webhook handler for checkout.session.completed events
Returns goal progress and recent supporters data
Returns daily dev quote that changes at 12:00 PM AEST

models.name: Supporter
models.description: Stores all supporter donations and details

models.name: Event
models.description: Analytics event tracking (CTA clicks, checkouts, conversions)

models.name: QuoteHistory

steps.description: Create .env file and add your Stripe keys
(Optional) Set up Stripe webhook forwarding for local testing

checklist: Run prisma generate in build step
Test Stripe in test mode first
Enable dark mode for all pages

npm_scripts.build: Generate Prisma client and build for production

components: components/Hero.tsx - Hero section with A/B tested headlines
components/CoffeeOptions.tsx - Support widget with tiers and custom amounts
components/Footer.tsx - Footer with social links and Matrix hint
components/AmbientAgent.tsx - Draggable AI/Coffee agents with jokes
